name: Raising the Princess After Her Death
author: Bang In-young
content: Long-term public service exam candidate Minseo finds himself trapped in the game, &quotRaising Lena&quot, as he tries to escape his grim reality. In the game, Minseo becomes a character named Leo, and he must navigate through a world with three different scenarios to accomplish his mission of turning the game&#039s protagonist, Lena, into a princess. However, &quotRaising Lena&quot boasts an overwhelming level of difficulty due to enemies who are set to thwart Minseo with their immense power and
